title.rendered: Join Codefresh at DockerCon Seattle Next Week

content.rendered:
DockerCon Seattle 2016 is right around the corner. If you’re going, the Codefresh team hopes to see you there!

As a Silver sponsor of the conference, we have a lot in store for you there. We will be giving away a Parrot Bebop Drone to the person who completes the most activities in the Codefresh platform, so be sure to stop by Booth #S38 to enter. Our team will be there from June 19-21, 2016, giving away Codefresh swag and answering any questions you may have about Docker automation and collaboration.

To kick off the event in style, we will be co-sponsoring a party Sunday, June 19 with HP Enterprise. Come join us for an evening of drinks, music, tapas, networking and surprises. See below for details:

  • WHEN: Sunday June 19, 2016,  7:00 pm to 12:00 midnight
  • WHERE: Fred Wildlife Refuge, 128 Belmont Ave. East, Seattle, WA 98102
  • REGISTER: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/dockercon-welcoming-party-tickets-25829145670 

Hope to see you there!

itemListElement.name: Join Codefresh at DockerCon Seattle Next Week

@graph.headline: Join Codefresh at DockerCon Seattle Next Week

@graph.name: Dan Garfield
@graph.description: Dan is the Co-Founder and Chief Open Source Officer at Codefresh. His work in open source includes being an Argo Maintainer, and co-chair of the GitOps Working Group. As a technology leader with a background in full-stack engineering, evangelism, and communications, he led Codefresh's go-to-market strategy and now leads open source strategy. You can follow him at twitter.com/todaywasawesome
